Conjuration 3

Summon Nagas

MA Bandar Log

Ritual
W2E1
spell id [id]: 422
effect number [effect_number]: 1
damage [damage]: 1319
number of effects [nreff]: 6
gems required [gemcost]: 15W
Summon Units:#1319 Naga Warrior x 6
Nagas are semi-divine serpent beings of the Nether World of Patala. They are sacred, can see in the dark and breathe under water. They are sprung from the Underworld and are skilled in metalworking and gem crafting. Naga warriors don gilded armor set with gleaming jewels that shine in the dark.
